DryadDataFile.dcterms:title: data_chickens_and_phasianids
DryadDataFile.dcterms:description: Data used for the analyses of SSD in chicken breeds and wild phasianids (data on separate sheets). Collected from published literature. Column headings either self-explanatory or explained by a note in MS Excel, which was used to create the data file.
DryadDataFile.dcterms:subject: Birds
Comparative studies
Life history evolution
Sexual selection & conflicts
